content.rendered:
2019 Fiesta Bowl Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including two nights hotel, entry level tickets for the Fiesta Bowl, daily breakfast, plus more. You can further customize your package with tickets to additional events, ticket upgrades, extra nights, room upgrades and anything else that will make your experience absolutely perfect.
Hotel PackagePackages From
Renaissance Phoenix Glendale Hotel & Spa $1,135
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 25% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until October 28, 2019. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
